entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grande-Vallée
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rivière-la-Madeleine 08:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: SE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Flurries beginning near noon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
